snippet: The half-dozen women had once pinned their wedding-day hopes on Jason Stevens, the owner of the now-closed event space reBar, who pleaded guilty to charges of tax fraud.
abstract: Jason Stevens, owner of restaurant and event space reBar, pleads guilty to charges of tax fraud in Brooklyn courtroom; Stevens had failed to pay more than $1 million in sales taxes; half-dozen women who had reserved the space for their weddings jeer at Stevens as he arrives at court.
lead_paragraph: The half-dozen women had once pinned their wedding-day hopes on Jason Stevens, the owner of the now-closed event space reBar, who pleaded guilty to charges of tax fraud.

headline.main: Brides Gather Outside Court to Jeer Restaurateur Who Dashed Wedding Plans
headline.print_headline: Brides Jeer Restaurateur After Guilty Plea in Court
